ygData.subject: RE: Mesmerize vs. Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: Pixie Chase does nothing more than stun a creature.  It doesn t mesmerize, clear the hate list, etc, etc, etc.  It has limited applications as far as I can
ygData.messageBody:
Pixie Chase does nothing more than stun a creature. It doesn't mesmerize,
clear the "hate" list, etc, etc, etc. It has limited applications as far as
I can tell. I once tried to Pixie + Hymn my way back to full health, but
the duration of it seems to be all over the board (as long as 10 seconds...
as short as 1 second..)

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

-----Original Message-----
From: Bard [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 5:47 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Mesmerize vs. Charm


From: "Bard" <dabard@...>

Okay, I give up... what's the difference between Song of the Sirens and
Pixie Chase?

-=B=-
Feelin' stoopit
